entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-105}{F813,1,413201}It's annoying that some black-winged{F801}jerk from who-knows-where has taken{F801}over Tokyo...{F801}{F802}Still, it's best to leave the{F801}negotiation stuff to Tayama.{F801}{F802}As long as he can supply Reds to us,{F801}we'll tolerate him.{F801}
